description: Composite n such that n*sigma(n) == 2 (mod phi(n)).
references: J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 147.
M. V. Subbarao, On two congruences for primality. Pacific J. Math. 52 (1974), 261-268.
mathematica: Select[Range[4,100], ! PrimeQ[#] && Mod[#*DivisorSigma[1, # ] - 2 , EulerPhi[#]] == 0 &] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 16 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Definition corrected by Tanya Khovanova, Nov 05 2007
